parameter.Value: SELECT announcer_id,announcer_name,avatar FROM announcer where game_id=1 and status=1
SELECT announcer_id,taobao_scheme,taobao_link FROM announcer_extend
SELECT announcer_id,create_time FROM announcer_video where game_id=1
select distinct highlight_id,highlight_name,avatar,update_time from highlight where game_id=1 and`status`=1 order by highlight_id

select distinct h.highlight_id,v.create_time from highlight h inner join highlight_video v on v.highlight_id=h.highlight_id where h.game_id=1 and h.`status`=1 order by highlight_id desc,v.create_time desc

select distinct c.article_id,c.header_image,c.`subject`,c.summary,c.dateline from(select distinct p.tag_id,p.site_id,p.channel_id,p.article_id from site_channel_tags s join publish_article_link_tags p on s.tag_id=p.tag_id and s.site_id=p.site_id and s.channel_id=p.channel_id where s.tag_name='lol' and p.channel_id=59 order by p.tag_id desc) h join site_article_channel c on c.article_id=h.article_id order by c.article_id desc
select distinct g.pic_url,gv.video_id,gv.gallery_id from gallery g inner join gallery_video gv on g.gallery_id=gv.gallery_id where g.game_id=1 and g.`status`=1 order by gv.gallery_id

select distinct h.module_id,h.module_name,t.type_name,h.weight from(Select distinct m.module_id,m.weight,m.module_name,m.type_id from present_module m inner join present p on p.module_id=m.module_id where m.game_id=1 and p.`status`=1 and p.game_id=1 order by m.weight) h inner join present_type t on t.type_id=h.type_id order by h.weight desc

Select distinct p.present_id,m.module_name,p.present_name,p.pic_url,p.description,m.module_id from present_module m inner join present p on p.module_id=m.module_id where m.game_id=1 and p.`status`=1 and p.game_id=1 order by m.weight desc,p.present_id
SELECT nickname,team_player_name,age,team_player_id,avatar FROM team_player
SELECT h.hero_id,p.team_player_id,h.win,h.lose FROM team_player p join team_player_hero h on p.team_player_id=h.team_player_id where p.game_id=1 and p.`status`=1
SELECT DISTINCT h.hero_name,h.hero_id,h.avatar FROM hero h join team_player_hero p on p.hero_id=h.hero_id where h.game_id=1 and h.`status`=1
SELECT DISTINCT r.join_time,r.team_player_id,r.leave_time,r.team_id FROM team_player_relation r join team_player p on p.team_player_id=r.team_player_id where r.game_id=1 and r.team_id>0
SELECT DISTINCT t.team_name,t.team_id,t.avatar FROM team t join team_player_relation r on r.team_id=t.team_id where t.game_id=1
SELECT achievements,team_player_id FROM team_player where game_id=1

select distinct o.screenshot,h3.team_player_id,o.`video_name`,o.play_times,o.update_time,o.video_id from(select h2.team_player_id,h2.team_id,h2.competition_detail_id,v.video_id from(select distinct h.team_player_id,h.team_id,c.competition_detail_id from(select distinct r.team_player_id,r.team_id from team_player t inner join team_player_relation r on t.team_player_id=r.team_player_id where t.game_id=1 and t.`status`=1 and r.game_id=1) h inner join competition_detail c on (h.team_id=c.team_id_1 or h.team_id=c.team_id_2) where c.type=1 and c.game_id=1 and c.`status`=1 order by h.team_player_id,c.competition_detail_id desc) h2 inner join competition_detail_video v on v.competition_detail_id=h2.competition_detail_id)h3 inner join video o on o.video_id=h3.video_id order by h3.team_player_id,o.video_id desc
SELECT competition_id,competition_name,avatar FROM competition where game_id=1 and status=1
SELECT video_id,screenshot,video_name,remark,play_times,update_time FROM `video` where game_id=1 and status=1 order by video_id desc
SELECT channel_id,screenshot,channel_name FROM `channel` where game_id=1 and `status`=1
SELECT video_id,screenshot,video_name,remark,play_times,update_time FROM video where game_id=1 and status=1 order by video_id desc
SELECT video_id,screenshot,video_name,remark,play_times,update_time FROM video where game_id=1 and status=1 order by video_id desc

select distinct t.type_id,t.type_name,m.module_id,p.present_id,v.video_id,o.screenshot,o.video_name,o.remark,o.play_times from present_type t join present_module m on t.type_id=m.type_id join present p on m.module_id=p.module_id join present_video v on p.present_id=v.present_id join video o on o.video_id=v.video_id where p.game_id=1 and p.`status`=1 and m.game_id=1 and m.`status`=1 and t.visiable=1 and o.game_id=1 and o.`status`=1 order by p.present_id desc, v.video_id desc
SELECT channel_id,channel_name,screenshot,online_numbers,source_site FROM channel where status=1 and game_id=1 and recommend=1
SELECT channel_id,channel_name,screenshot,online_numbers,source_site FROM channel where status=1 and game_id=1 and recommend=0
select point,avatar,rank,continent,rank_continent from team where team_id=2
select team_player_name,avatar,team_player_id from team_player where team_id=2 and status=1
select win,lose from team_history where team_id=2 order by date_time desc
select point,avatar,rank,continent,rank_continent from team where team_id=3
select team_player_name,avatar,team_player_id from team_player where team_id=3 and status=1
select win,lose from team_history where team_id=3 order by date_time desc
select rank,team_id,avatar,team_name,point,rank_changed from team where game_id=1 and status=1 order by rank asc
select rank,team_id,avatar,team_name,point,rank_changed from team where game_id=1 and status=1 and rank>1 order by rank asc
select rank,team_id,avatar,team_name,point,rank_changed from team where game_id=1 and status=1 and rank>2 order by rank asc
select rank,team_id,avatar,team_name,point,rank_changed from team where game_id=1 and status=1 and rank>3 order by rank asc
select role_id,role_name from role where game_id=1 order by create_time asc
select hero_id,hero_name,role_id,avatar,group_name from hero where status=1 and game_id=1 order by group_name asc

select t7.channel_id,t7.avatar,t7.status,t7.team_name_1,t7.team_avatar_1,t8.team_name as team_name_2,t8.avatar from (select t5.channel_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_id_1,t5.team_id_2,t5.status,t6.team_name as team_name_1,t6.avatar as team_avatar_1 from (select t3.channel_id,avatar,t3.team_id_1,t3.team_id_2,t3.status from (select t1.channel_id,t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2,t2.status from channel t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,channel_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where (team_id_1=1 or team_id_2=1) and type=2 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.channel_id =t2.channel_id) t3 inner join competition t4 on t3.competition_id=t4.competition_id) t5 inner join team t6 on t5.team_id_1=t6.team_id) t7 inner join team t8 on t7.team_id_2=t8.team_id

select t5.competition_detail_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_name_1,t5.team_avatar_1,t6.team_name as team_name_2,t6.avatar as team_avatar_2 from team t6 inner join (select t3.competition_detail_id,t3.avatar,t4.team_name as team_name_1,t4.avatar as team_avatar_1,t3.team_id_2 from team t4 inner join (select t1.competition_detail_id, t2.avatar, t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2 from competition t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where (team_id_1=1 or team_id_2=1) and type=1 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.competition_id=t2.competition_id)t3 on t3.team_id_1=t4.team_id) t5 on t5.team_id_2=t6.team_id

select t7.channel_id,t7.avatar,t7.status,t7.team_name_1,t7.team_avatar_1,t8.team_name as team_name_2,t8.avatar from (select t5.channel_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_id_1,t5.team_id_2,t5.status,t6.team_name as team_name_1,t6.avatar as team_avatar_1 from (select t3.channel_id,avatar,t3.team_id_1,t3.team_id_2,t3.status from (select t1.channel_id,t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2,t2.status from channel t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,channel_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where (team_id_1=1 or team_id_2=1) and type=2 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.channel_id =t2.channel_id) t3 inner join competition t4 on t3.competition_id=t4.competition_id) t5 inner join team t6 on t5.team_id_1=t6.team_id) t7 inner join team t8 on t7.team_id_2=t8.team_id

select t5.competition_detail_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_name_1,t5.team_avatar_1,t6.team_name as team_name_2,t6.avatar as team_avatar_2 from team t6 inner join (select t3.competition_detail_id,t3.avatar,t4.team_name as team_name_1,t4.avatar as team_avatar_1,t3.team_id_2 from team t4 inner join (select t1.competition_detail_id, t2.avatar, t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2 from competition t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where (team_id_1=1 or team_id_2=1) and type=1 and game_id=1 and status =1 and competition_detail_id<3 ) t1 on t1.competition_id=t2.competition_id)t3 on t3.team_id_1=t4.team_id) t5 on t5.team_id_2=t6.team_id

select t7.channel_id,t7.avatar,t7.status,t7.team_name_1,t7.team_avatar_1,t8.team_name as team_name_2,t8.avatar from (select t5.channel_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_id_1,t5.team_id_2,t5.status,t6.team_name as team_name_1,t6.avatar as team_avatar_1 from (select t3.channel_id,avatar,t3.team_id_1,t3.team_id_2,t3.status from (select t1.channel_id,t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2,t2.status from channel t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,channel_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where competition_id=1 and type=2 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.channel_id =t2.channel_id) t3 inner join competition t4 on t3.competition_id=t4.competition_id) t5 inner join team t6 on t5.team_id_1=t6.team_id) t7 inner join team t8 on t7.team_id_2=t8.team_id

select t5.competition_detail_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_name_1,t5.team_avatar_1,t6.team_name as team_name_2,t6.avatar as team_avatar_2 from team t6 inner join (select t3.competition_detail_id,t3.avatar,t4.team_name as team_name_1,t4.avatar as team_avatar_1,t3.team_id_2 from team t4 inner join (select t1.competition_detail_id, t2.avatar, t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2 from competition t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where competition_id=1 and type=1 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.competition_id=t2.competition_id)t3 on t3.team_id_1=t4.team_id) t5 on t5.team_id_2=t6.team_id

select t7.channel_id,t7.avatar,t7.status,t7.team_name_1,t7.team_avatar_1,t8.team_name as team_name_2,t8.avatar from (select t5.channel_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_id_1,t5.team_id_2,t5.status,t6.team_name as team_name_1,t6.avatar as team_avatar_1 from (select t3.channel_id,avatar,t3.team_id_1,t3.team_id_2,t3.status from (select t1.channel_id,t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2,t2.status from channel t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,channel_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where competition_id=1 and type=2 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.channel_id =t2.channel_id) t3 inner join competition t4 on t3.competition_id=t4.competition_id) t5 inner join team t6 on t5.team_id_1=t6.team_id) t7 inner join team t8 on t7.team_id_2=t8.team_id

select t5.competition_detail_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_name_1,t5.team_avatar_1,t6.team_name as team_name_2,t6.avatar as team_avatar_2 from team t6 inner join (select t3.competition_detail_id,t3.avatar,t4.team_name as team_name_1,t4.avatar as team_avatar_1,t3.team_id_2 from team t4 inner join (select t1.competition_detail_id, t2.avatar, t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2 from competition t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where competition_id=1 and type=1 and game_id=1 and status =1 and competition_detail_id<3 ) t1 on t1.competition_id=t2.competition_id)t3 on t3.team_id_1=t4.team_id) t5 on t5.team_id_2=t6.team_id

select t7.channel_id,t7.avatar,t7.status,t7.team_name_1,t7.team_avatar_1,t8.team_name as team_name_2,t8.avatar from (select t5.channel_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_id_1,t5.team_id_2,t5.status,t6.team_name as team_name_1,t6.avatar as team_avatar_1 from (select t3.channel_id,avatar,t3.team_id_1,t3.team_id_2,t3.status from (select t1.channel_id,t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2,t2.status from channel t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,channel_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where type=2 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.channel_id =t2.channel_id) t3 inner join competition t4 on t3.competition_id=t4.competition_id) t5 inner join team t6 on t5.team_id_1=t6.team_id) t7 inner join team t8 on t7.team_id_2=t8.team_id

select t5.competition_detail_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_name_1,t5.team_avatar_1,t6.team_name as team_name_2,t6.avatar as team_avatar_2 from team t6 inner join (select t3.competition_detail_id,t3.avatar,t4.team_name as team_name_1,t4.avatar as team_avatar_1,t3.team_id_2 from team t4 inner join (select t1.competition_detail_id, t2.avatar, t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2 from competition t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where type=1 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.competition_id=t2.competition_id)t3 on t3.team_id_1=t4.team_id) t5 on t5.team_id_2=t6.team_id

select t7.channel_id,t7.avatar,t7.status,t7.team_name_1,t7.team_avatar_1,t8.team_name as team_name_2,t8.avatar from (select t5.channel_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_id_1,t5.team_id_2,t5.status,t6.team_name as team_name_1,t6.avatar as team_avatar_1 from (select t3.channel_id,avatar,t3.team_id_1,t3.team_id_2,t3.status from (select t1.channel_id,t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2,t2.status from channel t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,channel_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where type=2 and game_id=1 and status =1) t1 on t1.channel_id =t2.channel_id) t3 inner join competition t4 on t3.competition_id=t4.competition_id) t5 inner join team t6 on t5.team_id_1=t6.team_id) t7 inner join team t8 on t7.team_id_2=t8.team_id

select t5.competition_detail_id,t5.avatar,t5.team_name_1,t5.team_avatar_1,t6.team_name as team_name_2,t6.avatar as team_avatar_2 from team t6 inner join (select t3.competition_detail_id,t3.avatar,t4.team_name as team_name_1,t4.avatar as team_avatar_1,t3.team_id_2 from team t4 inner join (select t1.competition_detail_id, t2.avatar, t1.competition_id,t1.team_id_1,t1.team_id_2 from competition t2 inner join (select competition_detail_id,competition_id,team_id_1,team_id_2 from competition_detail where type=1 and game_id=1 and status =1 and competition_detail_id<3 ) t1 on t1.competition_id=t2.competition_id)t3 on t3.team_id_1=t4.team_id) t5 on t5.team_id_2=t6.team_id
select player_id,player_name,avatar from player where game_id=1 and status=1
